Package chess

Class Knight

java.lang.Object
chess.Knight
public class Knight
extends java.lang.Object
A class that represents a knight located on a board object.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Knight​(Location loc, Board b)
    Make knight object at Location loc and on Board b.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Location bestMove()
    Returns the location of the best move for the knight to move.
    Location getCurrentLoc()
    Returns the current location of the knight
    Location move​(Location loc)
    Move this knight to loc and add the new location to list of past locations.
    java.util.List<Location> moves​(Location loc)
    Returns a list of all possible moves for knight from loc.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Knight

      public Knight​(Location loc, Board b)
      Make knight object at Location loc and on Board b. This constructor assumes loc is valid for b.
      Parameters:
      loc - location to create knight
      b - board for knight to be on

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentLoc

      public Location getCurrentLoc()
      Returns the current location of the knight
      Returns:
      The current location of the knight

    • bestMove

      public Location bestMove()
      Returns the location of the best move for the knight to move. In other words the move with the least number of possible moves following it and that the knight has not been to.
      Returns:
      Location of best move

    • moves

      public java.util.List<Location> moves​(Location loc)
      Returns a list of all possible moves for knight from loc. List does not include illegal moves or moves the knight has already made.
      Parameters:
      loc - location to find moves from
      Returns:
      List of possible moves for knight from loc

    • move

      public Location move​(Location loc)
      Move this knight to loc and add the new location to list of past locations. Returns null if loc is not on the board. Otherwise the new location of the knight is returned.
      Parameters:
      loc - Location to move to
      Returns:
      null if loc is out of bounds, otherwise the location that was moved to.
